name: Sid Meier's Alpha Centauri
description:
Sid Meier's Alpha Centauri is a strategy game developed by Firaxis. It was originally released in 1999. Electronic Arts published the game. On review aggregator Metacritic, Sid Meier's Alpha Centauri has a score of 92. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Sid Meier's Alpha Centauri on PC.
It was produced by Andy Hollis. Sid Meier directed the game. It was scored by Jeffery L. Briggs.
